data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile GOLFO2, Lagoa do Golfo II, Portugal

Centre of the mire. Local vegetation: Scirpus lacustris swamp. Core diameter: 4 cm. Area: 1.5 ha. Semi-terrestrial fen. Physiography: interfluvial lagoon. Surrounding vegetation: pinewoods/Erica scoparia heaths.
Ecologia histórica da paisagem do Noroeste Alentejano
